<div class="col-md-11 boxed-layout " style="padding: 10px;width: 97%">
    <section class="bg-act-section padding-bottom-20">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                <div class="text-center">
                    <h3>

                        The Tolls Act, 1851 

                        
                        
                    </h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            <h4 style="color: #fff;"> (
                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                            ACT
                                        
                                        NO. VIII OF 1851
                                    
                                

                                )
                            </h4>
                        
                    
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="bt-act-section-search ">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-bottom12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                <p class="pull-left no-print">
                    <a href="#" onclick="window.history.back();return false;"><i class="fa fa-arrow-left" title="Back"
                                                                                 aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
                <p class="pull-right print-center publish-date">
                    [ 4th July, 1851   ]
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    
    <section
            class="padding-bottom-20 ">
        <div class="row margin-top-20 ">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 lineremove">
                <button class="printIco print-only pull-right" onclick="window.print();return false;"
                        style="width: 72px;height: 80px;"><i
                        class="fa fa-print" style="font-size: 40px;"></i></button>
                
                    

                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="col-md-2"></div>
                            <div class="col-md-10 text-center act-role-style">
                                
                                <strong>
                                    An Act for enabling Government to levy Tolls on Public Roads and Bridges.

                                    
                                    
                                </strong>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row">
                            
                            
                            
                                <div class="col-md-2">&nbsp;&nbsp;Preamble</div>
                            

                            <div class="col-md-10">

                                
                                <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>WHEREAS it is expedient to enable Government to levy tolls upon roads and bridges; <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>It is enacted as follows:-  <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>   <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>   <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>

                                
                                
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    
                    
                    
                
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="padding-bottom-20 bg-striped ">
        
        
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	[Repealed]

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    1. [Repealed by the Repealing Act, 1870 (Act XIV of 1870).]

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Extent

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    1A.  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œThis Act extends to the whole of Bangladeshâ€ were substituted, for section 1A by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >1</a></sup></span></span>[This Act extends to the whole of Bangladesh].

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Power to cause levy of tolls on roads and bridges, and to appoint collectors

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    2. The  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œProvincialâ€ was omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973).'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >2</a></sup></span></span>[* * *] Government may cause such rates of toll, as it thinks fit, to be levied upon any road or bridge which has been, or shall hereafter be, made or repaired at the expense of the  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œCentral or any Provincialâ€ were omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973).'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='2' >3</a></sup></span></span>[* * *] Government; and may place the collection of such tolls under the management of such persons as may appear to it proper: and all persons employed in the management and collection of such tolls shall be liable to the same responsibilities as would belong to them if employed in the collection of the land-revenue.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Recovery of tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    3. In case of non-payment of any such toll on demand, the officer appointed to collect the same may seize any of the carriages or animals on which it is chargeable, or any part of their burden of sufficient value to defray the toll; and, if any toll remains undischarged for twenty-four hours, with the cost arising from such seizure, the case shall be brought before the officer appointed to superintend the collection of the said toll, who may sell the property seized for discharge of the toll, and all expenses occasioned by such non-payment, seizure and sale, and cause any balance that may remain to be returned, on demand, to the owner of the property; and the said officer, on receipt of the property, shall forthwith issue a notice that, at noon of the next day, exclusive of Sunday, or any closed holiday, he will sell the property by auction:

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            Release of seized property on tender of dues

                            
                            
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    Provided that, if, at any time before the sale has actually begun, the person whose property has been seized shall tender the amount of all the expenses incurred, and of double the toll payable by him, the said officer shall forthwith release the property seized.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Exemption from payment of tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    4. The following persons and things shall be exempt from payment of tolls:ï€­<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div> (a) Government Stores and persons in charge thereof;<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div> (b) Public servants travelling on duty, and the vehicles and animals employed by the persons aforesaid;<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div> (c) Any other class of persons or things which may be exempted by order of the  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œGovernmentâ€ was substituted, for the words â€œProvincial Governmentâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >4</a></sup></span></span>[Government] provided that no exemption shall be granted during the currency of a lease.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Assistance by Police-officers

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    5. All Police-officers shall be bound to assist the toll-collectors, when required, in the execution of this Act; and, for that purpose, shall have the same power which they have in the exercise of their common police-duties.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Penalty for offences.	Compensation to person aggrieved, etc

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    6. Every person, other than the persons appointed to collect the tolls under this Act, who shall levy or demand any toll on any public road or bridge, or for passing through any bazar situated thereon, and also every person who shall unlawfully and extortionately demand, or take any other or higher toll than the lawful toll, or under colour of this Act seize or sell any property knowing such seizure or sale to be unlawful, or in any manner unlawfully extort money or any valuable thing from any person under colour of this Act, shall be liable on conviction before a Magistrate to imprisonment for any term not exceeding six calendar months, or to fine not exceeding two hundred  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œTakaâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œrupeesâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >5</a></sup></span></span>[Taka], any part of which fine may be awarded by the Magistrate to the person aggrieved; but this remedy shall not be deemed to bar or affect his right to have redress by suit in the Civil Court.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Exhibition of table of tolls, and Statement of penalties

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    7. A table of the tolls authorized to be taken at any toll-gate or station shall be put up in a conspicuous place near such gate or station legibly written or printed in  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œBengaliâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œEnglishâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973).'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >6</a></sup></span></span>[Bengali] words and figures,  <span class='footnote'  title='The words and comma â€œand also in those of the vernacular language of the district,â€ were omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='2' >7</a></sup></span></span>[* * *] to which shall be annexed, written or printed in like manner, a statement of the penalties for refusing to pay the tolls and for taking any unlawful toll.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Tolls levied deemed to be public revenue

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    8. The tolls levied under this Act shall be deemed public revenue.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Lease of the levy of tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                     <span class='footnote'  title='Sections 9 to 14 were inserted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >8</a></sup></span></span>[9.(1) The Government may, from time to time, lease by public auction the levy of tolls upon any public road or bridge, for any period not exceeding 3 years, on such terms and conditions as it may deem fit.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(2) The levy of tolls shall be settled with the highest bidder by open public auction:<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Provided that the Government may, for sufficient reasons to be recorded in writing, refuse to accept the offer of the highest bidder, and may accept any other bid or may withdraw the tolls from such auction.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(3) The lessee shall give security for the due fulfilment of the conditions of the lease, and the sums payable under the terms of the lease shall be recoverable as a public demand.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Lessee and persons appointed by lessee deemed to be appointed to collect tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    10. When the right to collect tolls on any public road or bridge has been duly leased, the lessee and the persons employed by the lessee as his agent for collecting tolls shall be deemed to be persons appointed to collect tolls under this Act, and shall exercise all the powers and be subject to all the responsibilities attaching to persons so appointed.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Lessee may compound with any person

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    11. The lessee of any toll bar may compound with any person for a certain sum to be paid by such person for himself or for any vehicles or animals kept by him in lieu of the prescribed rates.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Penalty for refusal to pay toll

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    12. Whoever, having rendered himself liable to payment of tolls, refuses to pay such tolls, shall be liable to fine which may extend to one hundred Taka.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Government may direct any officer to discharge its power

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    13. The Government may, by notification in the official Gazette, direct that any power or duty which is conferred or imposed by this Act upon the Government, shall be exercised or discharged by any officer subordinate to it.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Rule making power

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    14. The Government may make rules, not inconsistent with the provisions of this Act, â€œto carry out the purposes of this Act.â€]<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        
        <hr/>
        <div>

        </div>
        <div class="footnoteListAll">
            <ul class="list-unstyled">

<script>

        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.test-tooltip').tooltip();
            // find tags and remove
            // remove empty p tag
            $('p').each(function () {
                var $this = $(this);
                if ($this.html().replace(/\s|&nbsp;/g, '').length == 0)
                    $this.remove();
            });


            $(document).on('click','.advancedSearch',function (event) {
                console.log(event);
                $('.advancedSearchForm').toggle("slow");
            })

            $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
            String.prototype.bn_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/0/g,'à§¦')
                        .replace(/1/g,'à§§')
                        .replace(/2/g,'à§¨')
                        .replace(/3/g,'à§©')
                        .replace(/4/g,'à§ª')
                        .replace(/5/g,'à§«')
                        .replace(/6/g,'à§¬')
                        .replace(/7/g,'à§­')
                        .replace(/8/g,'à§®')
                        .replace(/9/g,'à§¯');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }



            String.prototype.en_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/à§¦/g,'0')
                        .replace(/à§§/g,'1')
                        .replace(/à§¨/g,'2')
                        .replace(/à§©/g,'3')
                        .replace(/à§ª/g,'4')
                        .replace(/à§«/g,'5')
                        .replace(/à§¬/g,'6')
                        .replace(/à§­/g,'7')
                        .replace(/à§®/g,'8')
                        .replace(/à§¯/g,'9');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-td-index]",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var filter = [];

                $(this).parents("form").find("[data-td-index]").each(function (index){
                    if ($(this).val().trim()!="" && $(this).val()!=null){
                        filter.push(
                                {
                                    "bn": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number(),
                                    "en": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number(),
                                    "td": $(this).data("td-index")
                                }
                        )
                     }
                })


                var trs = table.find("tbody tr");

                $.each(trs, function (index, tr) {
                    var rowShow = true;
                    $.each(filter, function (ind, val){
                        console.log(val);
                        var td = $(tr).find("td").get(val["td"]);
                        var text = $(td).text();

                        if (text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["en"]) > -1
                        || text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["bn"]) > -1){
                            rowShow = rowShow && true;
                        }else{
                            rowShow = false;
                        }
                    })
                    if (rowShow==true){
                        $(tr).show();
                    }else{
                        $(tr).hide();
                    }
                } )

            })

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-search]",function () {


                var searchContent = $(this).data("search");

                var filter1 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number();
                var filter2 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number();


                var rows = $(document).find(searchContent);


                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {

                    var row = rows[i];
                    if (row) {
                        if ($(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter1) > -1
                                ||$(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter2) > -1
                        ) {
                            $(row).show();
                        } else {
                            $(row).hide();
                        }
                    }
                }
            })

            $(document).find(".removableRowTable").each(function (index) {
                console.log($(this).find("tbody tr").length);
                $(this).find("tbody").each(function () {
                    if ($(this).find("tr").length<=1){
                        $(this).remove();
                    }
                })
            })


            $(document).on("reset","form",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var tr = table.find("tbody tr");
                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < tr.length; i++) {

                    tr[i].style.display = "";

                }
            })

        });

                target: null, // Set a custom target element for scrolling to. Can be element or number
                text: '<i class="fa fa-chevron-circle-up" aria-hidden="true"></i>Top', // Text for element, can contain HTML

                skin: null,
                throttle: 250,

                namespace: 'scrollToTop'
            });
        });
        function validateForm(){
            var name=document.contactUsForm.name.value;
            var message=document.contactUsForm.message.value;
            var email=document.contactUsForm.email.value;

            if (name==null || name==""){
                alert("Name can't be blank");
                return false;
            }else if(email==null || email==""){
                alert("Email can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
            else if(message==null || message==""){
                alert("Message can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
        }

margin-bottom: 7px;color:#FF3399;">Print View</p>

<div class="col-md-11 boxed-layout " style="padding: 10px;width: 97%">
    <section class="bg-act-section padding-bottom-20">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                <div class="text-center">
                    <h3>

                        The Tolls Act, 1851 

                        
                        
                    </h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            <h4 style="color: #fff;"> (
                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                            ACT
                                        
                                        NO. VIII OF 1851
                                    
                                

                                )
                            </h4>
                        
                    
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="bt-act-section-search ">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-bottom12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                <p class="pull-left no-print">
                    <a href="#" onclick="window.history.back();return false;"><i class="fa fa-arrow-left" title="Back"
                                                                                 aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
                <p class="pull-right print-center publish-date">
                    [ 4th July, 1851   ]
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    
    <section
            class="padding-bottom-20 ">
        <div class="row margin-top-20 ">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 lineremove">
                <button class="printIco print-only pull-right" onclick="window.print();return false;"
                        style="width: 72px;height: 80px;"><i
                        class="fa fa-print" style="font-size: 40px;"></i></button>
                
                    

                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="col-md-2"></div>
                            <div class="col-md-10 text-center act-role-style">
                                
                                <strong>
                                    An Act for enabling Government to levy Tolls on Public Roads and Bridges.

                                    
                                    
                                </strong>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row">
                            
                            
                            
                                <div class="col-md-2">&nbsp;&nbsp;Preamble</div>
                            

                            <div class="col-md-10">

                                
                                <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>WHEREAS it is expedient to enable Government to levy tolls upon roads and bridges; <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>It is enacted as follows:-  <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>   <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>   <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>

                                
                                
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    
                    
                    
                
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="padding-bottom-20 bg-striped ">
        
        
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	[Repealed]

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    1. [Repealed by the Repealing Act, 1870 (Act XIV of 1870).]

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Extent

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    1A.  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œThis Act extends to the whole of Bangladeshâ€ were substituted, for section 1A by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >1</a></sup></span></span>[This Act extends to the whole of Bangladesh].

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Power to cause levy of tolls on roads and bridges, and to appoint collectors

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    2. The  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œProvincialâ€ was omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973).'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >2</a></sup></span></span>[* * *] Government may cause such rates of toll, as it thinks fit, to be levied upon any road or bridge which has been, or shall hereafter be, made or repaired at the expense of the  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œCentral or any Provincialâ€ were omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973).'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='2' >3</a></sup></span></span>[* * *] Government; and may place the collection of such tolls under the management of such persons as may appear to it proper: and all persons employed in the management and collection of such tolls shall be liable to the same responsibilities as would belong to them if employed in the collection of the land-revenue.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Recovery of tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    3. In case of non-payment of any such toll on demand, the officer appointed to collect the same may seize any of the carriages or animals on which it is chargeable, or any part of their burden of sufficient value to defray the toll; and, if any toll remains undischarged for twenty-four hours, with the cost arising from such seizure, the case shall be brought before the officer appointed to superintend the collection of the said toll, who may sell the property seized for discharge of the toll, and all expenses occasioned by such non-payment, seizure and sale, and cause any balance that may remain to be returned, on demand, to the owner of the property; and the said officer, on receipt of the property, shall forthwith issue a notice that, at noon of the next day, exclusive of Sunday, or any closed holiday, he will sell the property by auction:

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            Release of seized property on tender of dues

                            
                            
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    Provided that, if, at any time before the sale has actually begun, the person whose property has been seized shall tender the amount of all the expenses incurred, and of double the toll payable by him, the said officer shall forthwith release the property seized.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Exemption from payment of tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    4. The following persons and things shall be exempt from payment of tolls:ï€­<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div> (a) Government Stores and persons in charge thereof;<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div> (b) Public servants travelling on duty, and the vehicles and animals employed by the persons aforesaid;<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div> (c) Any other class of persons or things which may be exempted by order of the  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œGovernmentâ€ was substituted, for the words â€œProvincial Governmentâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >4</a></sup></span></span>[Government] provided that no exemption shall be granted during the currency of a lease.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Assistance by Police-officers

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    5. All Police-officers shall be bound to assist the toll-collectors, when required, in the execution of this Act; and, for that purpose, shall have the same power which they have in the exercise of their common police-duties.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Penalty for offences.	Compensation to person aggrieved, etc

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    6. Every person, other than the persons appointed to collect the tolls under this Act, who shall levy or demand any toll on any public road or bridge, or for passing through any bazar situated thereon, and also every person who shall unlawfully and extortionately demand, or take any other or higher toll than the lawful toll, or under colour of this Act seize or sell any property knowing such seizure or sale to be unlawful, or in any manner unlawfully extort money or any valuable thing from any person under colour of this Act, shall be liable on conviction before a Magistrate to imprisonment for any term not exceeding six calendar months, or to fine not exceeding two hundred  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œTakaâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œrupeesâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >5</a></sup></span></span>[Taka], any part of which fine may be awarded by the Magistrate to the person aggrieved; but this remedy shall not be deemed to bar or affect his right to have redress by suit in the Civil Court.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Exhibition of table of tolls, and Statement of penalties

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    7. A table of the tolls authorized to be taken at any toll-gate or station shall be put up in a conspicuous place near such gate or station legibly written or printed in  <span class='footnote'  title='The word â€œBengaliâ€ was substituted, for the word â€œEnglishâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973).'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >6</a></sup></span></span>[Bengali] words and figures,  <span class='footnote'  title='The words and comma â€œand also in those of the vernacular language of the district,â€ were omitted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='2' >7</a></sup></span></span>[* * *] to which shall be annexed, written or printed in like manner, a statement of the penalties for refusing to pay the tolls and for taking any unlawful toll.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Tolls levied deemed to be public revenue

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    8. The tolls levied under this Act shall be deemed public revenue.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Lease of the levy of tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                     <span class='footnote'  title='Sections 9 to 14 were inserted by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >8</a></sup></span></span>[9.(1) The Government may, from time to time, lease by public auction the levy of tolls upon any public road or bridge, for any period not exceeding 3 years, on such terms and conditions as it may deem fit.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(2) The levy of tolls shall be settled with the highest bidder by open public auction:<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>Provided that the Government may, for sufficient reasons to be recorded in writing, refuse to accept the offer of the highest bidder, and may accept any other bid or may withdraw the tolls from such auction.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(3) The lessee shall give security for the due fulfilment of the conditions of the lease, and the sums payable under the terms of the lease shall be recoverable as a public demand.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Lessee and persons appointed by lessee deemed to be appointed to collect tolls

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    10. When the right to collect tolls on any public road or bridge has been duly leased, the lessee and the persons employed by the lessee as his agent for collecting tolls shall be deemed to be persons appointed to collect tolls under this Act, and shall exercise all the powers and be subject to all the responsibilities attaching to persons so appointed.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Lessee may compound with any person

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    11. The lessee of any toll bar may compound with any person for a certain sum to be paid by such person for himself or for any vehicles or animals kept by him in lieu of the prescribed rates.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Penalty for refusal to pay toll

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    12. Whoever, having rendered himself liable to payment of tolls, refuses to pay such tolls, shall be liable to fine which may extend to one hundred Taka.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Government may direct any officer to discharge its power

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    13. The Government may, by notification in the official Gazette, direct that any power or duty which is conferred or imposed by this Act upon the Government, shall be exercised or discharged by any officer subordinate to it.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            	Rule making power

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    14. The Government may make rules, not inconsistent with the provisions of this Act, â€œto carry out the purposes of this Act.â€]<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>

        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.test-tooltip').tooltip();
            // find tags and remove
            // remove empty p tag
            $('p').each(function () {
                var $this = $(this);
                if ($this.html().replace(/\s|&nbsp;/g, '').length == 0)
                    $this.remove();
            });


            $(document).on('click','.advancedSearch',function (event) {
                console.log(event);
                $('.advancedSearchForm').toggle("slow");
            })

            $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
            String.prototype.bn_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/0/g,'à§¦')
                        .replace(/1/g,'à§§')
                        .replace(/2/g,'à§¨')
                        .replace(/3/g,'à§©')
                        .replace(/4/g,'à§ª')
                        .replace(/5/g,'à§«')
                        .replace(/6/g,'à§¬')
                        .replace(/7/g,'à§­')
                        .replace(/8/g,'à§®')
                        .replace(/9/g,'à§¯');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }



            String.prototype.en_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/à§¦/g,'0')
                        .replace(/à§§/g,'1')
                        .replace(/à§¨/g,'2')
                        .replace(/à§©/g,'3')
                        .replace(/à§ª/g,'4')
                        .replace(/à§«/g,'5')
                        .replace(/à§¬/g,'6')
                        .replace(/à§­/g,'7')
                        .replace(/à§®/g,'8')
                        .replace(/à§¯/g,'9');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-td-index]",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var filter = [];

                $(this).parents("form").find("[data-td-index]").each(function (index){
                    if ($(this).val().trim()!="" && $(this).val()!=null){
                        filter.push(
                                {
                                    "bn": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number(),
                                    "en": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number(),
                                    "td": $(this).data("td-index")
                                }
                        )
                     }
                })


                var trs = table.find("tbody tr");

                $.each(trs, function (index, tr) {
                    var rowShow = true;
                    $.each(filter, function (ind, val){
                        console.log(val);
                        var td = $(tr).find("td").get(val["td"]);
                        var text = $(td).text();

                        if (text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["en"]) > -1
                        || text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["bn"]) > -1){
                            rowShow = rowShow && true;
                        }else{
                            rowShow = false;
                        }
                    })
                    if (rowShow==true){
                        $(tr).show();
                    }else{
                        $(tr).hide();
                    }
                } )

            })

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-search]",function () {


                var searchContent = $(this).data("search");

                var filter1 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number();
                var filter2 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number();


                var rows = $(document).find(searchContent);


                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {

                    var row = rows[i];
                    if (row) {
                        if ($(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter1) > -1
                                ||$(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter2) > -1
                        ) {
                            $(row).show();
                        } else {
                            $(row).hide();
                        }
                    }
                }
            })

            $(document).find(".removableRowTable").each(function (index) {
                console.log($(this).find("tbody tr").length);
                $(this).find("tbody").each(function () {
                    if ($(this).find("tr").length<=1){
                        $(this).remove();
                    }
                })
            })


            $(document).on("reset","form",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var tr = table.find("tbody tr");
                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < tr.length; i++) {

                    tr[i].style.display = "";

                }
            })

        });

        $(document).ready(function($) {
            $('body').scrollToTop({
                distance: 200,
                speed: 1000,
                easing: 'linear',
                animation: 'fade', // fade, slide, none
                animationSpeed: 500,

                mobile: {
                    width: 768,
                    distance: 100,
                    speed: 1000,
                    easing: 'easeInOutElastic',
                    animation: 'slide',
                    animationSpeed: 200
                },

                trigger: null, // Set a custom triggering element. Can be an HTML string or jQuery object
                target: null, // Set a custom target element for scrolling to. Can be element or number
                text: '<i class="fa fa-chevron-circle-up" aria-hidden="true"></i>Top', // Text for element, can contain HTML

                skin: null,
                throttle: 250,

                namespace: 'scrollToTop'
            });
        });
        function validateForm(){
            var name=document.contactUsForm.name.value;
            var message=document.contactUsForm.message.value;
            var email=document.contactUsForm.email.value;

            if (name==null || name==""){
                alert("Name can't be blank");
                return false;
            }else if(email==null || email==""){
                alert("Email can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
            else if(message==null || message==""){
                alert("Message can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
        }


    /*    $(document).ready(function(){
            loopcounter('first-counter');
            loopcounter('second-counter');
        });*/
</script>
